### Library:

```{r}
#| eval: false 
#| echo: true
#| message: false
library("tidyverse")
library("ggridges")
library("viridis")
library("broom")
library("ggrepel")
```

### loading:

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
#| message: false
source("../R/99_proj_func.R")

pheno_data <- vroom::vroom("../data/02_ncbi_clean_pheno.tsv.gz", delim = "\t")
expr_data <- vroom::vroom("../data/02_ncbi_clean_expr.tsv.gz", delim = "\t")

feature_data <- vroom::vroom("../data/04_feature_data.tsv.gz", delim = "\t")
pheno_data <- vroom::vroom("../data/01_pheno_data.tsv.gz", delim = "\t")
norm_exprs <- vroom::vroom("../data/01_norm_exprs.tsv.gz", delim = "\t")
```

### joining:

```{r}
#| eval: false 
#| echo: true

# Joining
joined_tables <- pheno_data |>
  full_join(wrangled_norm_exprs)
```
